谾谾谾

谾字的基本解释

谾
hōng
〔谾谾〕ａ．（山谷）空而深，如“岩岩深山之谾谾兮。”ｂ．象声词，如“谷声谾谾”。

谾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hōng］
［《廣韻》呼東切，平東，曉。］
［《廣韻》許江切，平江，曉。］
(1)谷空貌。参见“谾谼”、“谾壑”。
(2)象声词。
[②]［lóng］
同“豅1”。
长大的山谷。

谾字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【谷字部】　谾； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1190第17
【廣韻】呼東切【集韻】呼公切，?音烘。【字林】谷空貌。【吳儆·浮丘仙賦】谾壑奧竇，鬱律嬗娟。　又【廣韻】盧東切，音籠。山深貌。【史記·司馬相如傳】深山之谾谾。【師古註】深通貌。【晉灼註】長大貌。谾，古豅字。　又【廣韻】許江切【集韻】虛江切，?音肛。空谷貌。　又【集韻】枯江切，音腔。山谷深貌。

谾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
谾字的起名意思

暂无。

Stubborn
Basic explanation of words
Stubborn
hōng
〔谾谾〕a. The (valley) is empty and deep, as in "the lagging behind the rocks and deep mountains." b. Onomatopoeia, such as "gushengyeye".
Stubborn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hōng］
["Guangyun" Hu Dongqie, Pingdong, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Jiangqie, Pingjiang, Xiao. ]
(1) The appearance of the valley. See "谾谼", "谾壑".
(2) Onomatopoeia.
[②]［lóng］
Same as "豅1".
Grown up in the valley.
Stubborn
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Gu Zi Department] 　谾; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1190 Page 17
[Guangyun] Hudongqie [Jiyun] Hugongqie, sound bake. [Word Lin] The appearance of the empty valley. 【Wu Zhang·Fuqiu Xianfu】Oddou, Yu Lv He Juan.　[Guang Yun] Lu Dongqie, sound cage. The mountains are deep. 【Historical Records · Sima Xiangru Biography】The sequel of the mountains. [Teacher Gu's Note] Deeply understand the appearance. 【Jin Zhuo Note】Grow up appearance.谾, the ancient word.　[Guangyun] Xu Jiangqie [Jiyun] Xujiangqie, sound anus. Empty valley appearance.　[Jiyun] Kujiang cut, tune. The valley is deep.
